name: Linesweeper: Putty Putty Puck Puck!
description:
Move the Orange and Blue "diamonds" around the level and try to push the pucks into the holes of the same color! To push them you need to activate the laser beam (See controls below)

Pro tip #1

You can only activate the laser beam when it's not intersecting any pucks!

Pro tip #2

The controls can take a while to get used to. Think of them as "Moving the diamonds to align with the angle of the joystick/keyboard input"!

Pro tip #3

You can toggle between two different control modes. one-axis and two-axis. The default is two-axis mode. In one-axis mode the diamonds will move in clockwise/counter-clockwise order around the level when you move Up/Down on the gamepad/keyboard

Pro tip #4

The game is fully playable together with a friend! Connect another gamepad, or share the keyboard to co-operatively clear the levels!
